# Arithmetic Functions

## Addition

$$
c = a + b
$$

### Derivatives {-}

$$
\frac{\partial}{\partial a} c  = 1
\qquad
\frac{\partial}{\partial b} c = 1
$$

### Tangent {-}

$$
\dot{c} = \dot{a} + \dot{b}
$$

### Adjoints {-}

$$
\bar{a} \ {+=} \ \bar{c}
\qquad
\bar{b} \ {+=} \ \bar{c}
$$


## Subtraction

$$
c = a - b
$$

### Derivatives {-}

$$
\frac{\partial}{\partial a} c = 1
\qquad
\frac{\partial}{\partial b} c = -1
$$


### Tangent {-}

$$
\dot{c} = \dot{a} - \dot{b}
$$

### Adjoints {-}

$$
\bar{a} {+=} \bar{c}
\qquad
\bar{b} {+=} -\bar{c}
$$
